refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect2.title: enum GnomePrintRangeType
gnome_print_dialog_new ()
refsect2.para: The following options flags are available: GNOME_PRINT_DIALOG_RANGE: A range widget container will be created. A range widget must be created separately, using one of the gnome_print_dialog_construct_* functions. GNOME_PRINT_DIALOG_COPIES: A copies widget will be created.

listitem.simpara: GnomePrintJob
Title of window.
Options for created widget.
A newly created and initialised widget.

refsect2.title: gnome_print_dialog_construct ()
refsect2.para: Used for language bindings to post-initialise an object instantiation.

listitem.simpara: A created GnomePrintDialog.
Title of the window.
Initialisation options, see gnome_print_dialog_new().

refsect2.title: gnome_print_dialog_construct_range_custom ()
refsect2.para: Install a custom range specification widget.

listitem.simpara: A GnomePrintDialog for which a range was requested.
A widget which will be placed in a "Range" frame in the main display.

refsect2.title: gnome_print_dialog_construct_range_any ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gnome_print_dialog_construct_range_any (GnomePrintDialog *gpd, gint flags, GtkWidget *range_widget, const guchar *currentlabel, const guchar *rangelabel);
refsect2.para: Create a generic range area within the print range dialogue. The flags field contains a mask of which options you wish displayed:

GNOME_PRINT_RANGE_CURRENT: A label currentlabel will be displayed. GNOME_PRINT_RANGE_ALL: A label "All" will be displayed. GNOME_PRINT_RANGE_RANGE: A label rangelabel will be displayed, next to the range specification widget range_widget. GNOME_PRINT_RANGE_SELECTION: A label "Selection" will be displayed.

listitem.simpara: An initialise GnomePrintDialog, which can contain a range.
Options flags, which ranges are displayed.
Widget to display for the range option.
Label to display next to the 'current page' button.
Label to display next to the 'range' button.

refsect2.title: gnome_print_dialog_construct_range_page ()
refsect2.programlisting: void gnome_print_dialog_construct_range_page (GnomePrintDialog *gpd, gint flags, gint start, gint end, const guchar *currentlabel, const guchar *rangelabel);
refsect2.para: Construct a generic page/sheet range area.

listitem.simpara: An initialise GnomePrintDialog, which can contain a range.
Option flags. See gnome_print_dialog_construct_any().
First page which may be printed.
Last page which may be printed.
Label text for current option.
Label text for range option.

refsect2.title: gnome_print_dialog_get_range ()
refsect2.para: Return the range option selected by the user. This is a bitmask with only 1 bit set, out of:

GNOME_PRINT_RANGE_CURRENT: The current option selected. GNOME_PRINT_RANGE_ALL: The all option selected. GNOME_PRINT_RANGE_RANGE The range option selected. GNOME_PRINT_RANGE_SELECTION: The selection option selected.

listitem.simpara: A GnomePrintDialog with a range display.
A bitmask with one option set.

refsect2.title: gnome_print_dialog_get_range_page ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the user choice for range type and range, if the user has requested a range of pages to print.

listitem.simpara: A GnomePrintDialog with a page range display.
Return for the user-specified start page.
Return for the user-specified end page.
A bitmask with the user-selection set. See gnome_print_dialog_get_range().

refsect2.title: gnome_print_dialog_get_copies ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the number of copies and collation indicator from the print dialogue. If the print dialogue does not have a copies indicator, then a default of 1 copy is returned.

listitem.simpara: A GnomePrintDialog with a copies display.
Return for the number of copies.
Return for collation flag.

refsect2.title: gnome_print_dialog_set_copies ()
refsect2.para: Sets the print copies and collation status in the print dialogue.

listitem.simpara: A GnomePrintDialog with a copies display.
New number of copies.
New collation status.
